languages.text: {n}Возбужденно гомонящая толпа сомкнулась вокруг нескольких изможденных людей. По лицам некоторых из них размазана свежая кровь. Злые выкрики, перекошенные лица не оставляют сомнений — готовится расправа.{/n}

{n}The buzzing crowd has closed in on several harried-looking individuals. Some of their faces are smeared with fresh blood. The angry cries and twisted faces leave no doubt — a massacre is about to take place.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Возбужденно гомонящая толпа сомкнулась вокруг нескольких изможденных людей. По лицам некоторых из них размазана свежая кровь. Злые выкрики, перекошенные лица не оставляют сомнений — готовится расправа.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The buzzing crowd has closed in on several harried-looking people sitting on the ground. Some of their faces are smeared with fresh blood. The angry cries and twisted faces leave no doubt — lynching is about to take place.{/n}

{n}The buzzing crowd has closed in on several harried-looking people sitting on the ground. Some of their faces are smeared with fresh blood. The angry cries and twisted faces leave no doubt — lynching is about to take place.{/n}

{n}The buzzing crowd has closed in on several harried-looking people sitting on the ground. Some of their faces are smeared with fresh blood. The angry cries and twisted faces leave no doubt — a massacre is about to take place.{/n}

{n}The buzzing crowd has closed in on several harried-looking people sitting on the ground. Some of their faces are smeared with fresh blood. The angry cries and twisted faces leave no doubt — a massacre is about to take place.{/n}

{n}The buzzing crowd has closed in on several harried-looking people. Some of their faces are smeared with fresh blood. The angry cries and twisted faces leave no doubt — a massacre is about to take place.{/n}

{n}The buzzing crowd has closed in on several harried-looking individuals. Some of their faces are smeared with fresh blood. The angry cries and twisted faces leave no doubt — a massacre is about to take place.{/n}

languages.text: {n}騒がしい群衆が数人の慌てた様子の人物に迫っている。顔には鮮血が塗りつけられた者もいる。怒りに満ちた叫び声と歪んだ表情は、これから大虐殺が行われようとしていることを示唆している。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The buzzing crowd has closed in on several harried-looking individuals. Some of their faces are smeared with fresh blood. The angry cries and twisted faces leave no doubt — a massacre is about to take place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}騒がしい群衆が数人の慌てた様子の人物に迫っている。顔には鮮血が塗りつけられた者もいる。怒りに満ちた叫び声と歪んだ表情は、これから大虐殺が行われようとしていることを示唆している。{/n}

languages.text: {n}熙熙攘攘的人群围住了几个看起来很狼狈的人，其中一部分人脸上沾满了鲜血。愤怒的呼喊和扭曲的面孔毫无疑问地表明，一场屠杀即将爆发。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The buzzing crowd has closed in on several harried-looking individuals. Some of their faces are smeared with fresh blood. The angry cries and twisted faces leave no doubt — a massacre is about to take place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}熙熙攘攘的人群围住了几个看起来很狼狈的人，其中一部分人脸上沾满了鲜血。愤怒的呼喊和扭曲的面孔毫无疑问地表明，一场屠杀即将爆发。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La multitud ha acorralado a varios individuos de aspecto atormentado. Algunos de sus rostros están manchados de sangre fresca. Los gritos de rabia y los rostros desencajados no dejan lugar a dudas: está a punto de producirse una masacre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The buzzing crowd has closed in on several harried-looking individuals. Some of their faces are smeared with fresh blood. The angry cries and twisted faces leave no doubt — a massacre is about to take place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La multitud ha acorralado a varios individuos de aspecto atormentado. Algunos de sus rostros están manchados de sangre fresca. Los gritos de rabia y los rostros desencajados no dejan lugar a dudas: está a punto de producirse una masacre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La foule agitée encercle plusieurs individus qui semblent déjà avoir été malmenés. Le visage de certains est couvert de sang frais. Les cris et les grimaces de colère ne laissent pas de place au doute : un massacre est sur le point d'avoir lieu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The buzzing crowd has closed in on several harried-looking individuals. Some of their faces are smeared with fresh blood. The angry cries and twisted faces leave no doubt — a massacre is about to take place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La foule agitée encercle plusieurs individus qui semblent déjà avoir été malmenés. Le visage de certains est couvert de sang frais. Les cris et les grimaces de colère ne laissent pas de place au doute : un massacre est sur le point d'avoir lieu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die unruhige Menge hat mehrere gehetzt wirkende Personen umringt. Einige Gesichter sind mit frischem Blut verschmiert. Die wütenden Rufe und verzerrten Gesichter lassen keinen Zweifel – hier findet gleich ein Massaker statt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The buzzing crowd has closed in on several harried-looking individuals. Some of their faces are smeared with fresh blood. The angry cries and twisted faces leave no doubt — a massacre is about to take place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die unruhige Menge hat mehrere gehetzt wirkende Personen umringt. Einige Gesichter sind mit frischem Blut verschmiert. Die wütenden Rufe und verzerrten Gesichter lassen keinen Zweifel – hier findet gleich ein Massaker statt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Uğultulu bir kalabalık, tartaklanmış görünen birkaç kişinin etrafını sarmış. Bazılarının yüzünde taze kan izleri var. Öfkeli bağırışlar ve çarpık suratlar şüpheye mahal bırakmıyor: Bir katliam gerçekleşmek üzere.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The buzzing crowd has closed in on several harried-looking individuals. Some of their faces are smeared with fresh blood. The angry cries and twisted faces leave no doubt — a massacre is about to take place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gürültülü bir kalabalık, bezgin görünümlü birkaç kişinin etrafında toplanmış durumda. Bazılarının yüzünde taze kan izleri var. Öfkeli bağırışlar ve kızgın bakışlardan belli oluyor ki bir katliam gerçekleşmek üzere.{/n}
